home.title: Understand your side project's
home.subtitle: Free financial calculators to help you make smarter decisions about pricing, growth, and profitability.
home.calculatorsSubtitle: Each tool is designed to give you clarity on a specific aspect of your project's finances.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Join hundreds of developers making smarter business decisions

testimonials.testimonial1: Finally, a toolkit that speaks my language. No BS, just numbers.
testimonials.testimonial2: Helped me price my SaaS with confidence. Worth every minute.
testimonials.testimonial3: Clean, fast, and exactly what I needed to validate my ideas.

pro.description: BreakEven Pro includes the Churn Calculator, MRR Simulator, and Retention Calculator, plus unlimited exports.
pro.defaultDescription: Support development and unlock advanced calculators and unlimited exports with BreakEven Pro.
pro.titleDescription: Get BreakEven Pro to unlock {{title}} and other advanced tools. {{subtitle}}

proInfo.title: BreakEven Pro
proInfo.subtitle: Unlock all calculators, advanced simulations, and unlimited exports.
proInfo.advancedToolsDesc: Churn Calculator, MRR Simulator, Retention Calculator
proInfo.unlimitedExportsDesc: Export results and scenarios without limits
proInfo.description: No recurring fees. Your license unlocks all current Pro features. Enter your license key to activate.
proInfo.activateDesc: Paste your license key below to unlock all features.
proInfo.faq1Answer: BreakEven Pro unlocks advanced calculators (Churn, MRR Simulator, Retention) and unlimited exports.
proInfo.faq2Question: How do I activate my license?
proInfo.faq2Answer: Click "Enter license key" above, paste your key, and select Activate. Your browser stores the license.
proInfo.faq3Answer: No, it is a one-time license for the currently available Pro features.
proInfo.contactText: Facing any issues? Email us at
proInfo.activatedDesc:
Thank you so much for your support!
Enjoy all the Pro features.
